reviewText: When I watched it I thought it followed pretty well along the manga but, I wish they wouldn't of made 2 1/2 episodes just for fighting. I like it better when they envolve the characters talking. Which does happen but only  in the 3rd and 4th epidoes of the tape. This tape also gives a clif hanger  enough that I might even purchase the next tape!

I bought this video a while ago, but it's so full of Romance and love, I can't resist to watch it over and over:) I definetly reccomend this to people who love both Magic Girl anime, and the power of love!
